description:
Founded in 1966, the Louisville, Kentucky, law firm of Bornstein & Oppenheimer, PLLC, offers clients across Kentucky and Southern Indiana the benefits of our attorneys' experience in practice areas of personal injury (including motor vehicle accidents), real estate law, family law, estate planning and commercial collection.

Because of our high ethical standards, reputation for integrity in the community, commitment to excellence and our dedication to personal service, most of our clients have stayed with us for years and referred many clients to us.

Bornstein & Oppenheimer, PLLC â€” Dedicated To Excellence In Representation For Almost 50 Years

Our personal injury practice assists innocent victims of serious injuries in motor vehicle accidents, and who deserve maximum financial compensation to defray lost income, medical bills and vehicle replacement costs. 

Our commercial collections practice advocates for our business clients' right to collect outstanding commercial loans or overdue business debts. As estate planners, we have guided numerous clients in the planning and administration of their assets and estates.

In the family law field, we routinely help individuals, couples and families engaged in divorce proceedings, child custody disputes or child support negotiations. For commercial real estate matters, we assist our business clients in drafting, negotiating, and interpreting the terms of various types of sales, purchase or lease agreements. We also provide clients with a wide range of counsel and advocacy in matters related to the proper functioning of their businesses.

Bornstein & Oppenheimer, PLLC, lawyers are highly experienced and reputable litigators, negotiators, advocates and counselors. We extend the highest levels of respect, courtesy and professionalism to every client.

Were you or a loved one seriously injured in a motor vehicle accident caused by another driver's negligence? Are you divorcing, starting a business or in the process of building an estate plan? Contact our law firm today to have your legal matter handled by experienced, knowledgeable and competent counsel.
